alert.note: Alert for Kaibab Plateau (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued December 30 at 7:31PM MST until January 02 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM SATURDAY EVENING THROUGH LATE SUNDAY NIGHT ABOVE 6000 FEET... * WHAT...Heavy snow possible above 6000 feet. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 8 inches possible with as much as 12 inches above 8000 feet. Winds could gust as high as 40 mph Saturday night, decreasing to 25 mph Sunday. * WHERE...Areas above 6000 feet near Jacob Lake. * WHEN...From Saturday evening through late Sunday night. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact holiday travel Sunday. Snow forecast from 11 PM Saturday to 5 AM Monday: Jacob Lake 4 to 6 inches.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.
